cab.content: BATTLE SITUATION - EVENING - 21st APRIL, 1918cConsiderable shelling north of HINGES early thismorning cBesides this and a slight improvement In our positions east cf RGBECQ, and PACATJT WOOD there is nothing of interest to reportsGeneral Staff,War Office, StW0l.21st Aprilj, 1918 8Issued at 5c30 poiru
